abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Eugene Miagkov at
            the meeting of March 30, 2000 concerning the Country
            Assistance Strategy, the Fiscal and Administrative Reform
            Special Structural Adjustment Loan, and the Second Social
            Security Special Structural Adjustment Loan for Brazil.
